name: Jumpy Steve the Minecraft Platformer
description:
This is a Minecraft platformer that is Endless.

Controls:

A,D: to move 

W: to Jump

Hold W when touching bottom of platform to grab on

When you die you can upload Score to online leaderboard, to do that you have to:

Click on grey box 

Type name

Press leaderboard button to view leaderboard 

or press upload score to upload score then go back to game

Press restart to restart game without uploading score
